books.author: Louise Penny
books.description: The 20th book in the Chief Inspector Gamache series. After thwarting a terrorist attack, an injured Gamache leads a covert investigation.
books.title: THE BLACK WOLF

books.author: John Grisham
books.description: When Simon Latch, a lawyer in rural Virginia, is accused of murder, he goes in search of the real killer.
books.title: THE WIDOW

books.author: Jasmine Mas
books.description: The second book in the Villains of Lore series. Seduction and danger put Hercules in a tough spot.
books.title: BONDS OF HERCULES

books.author: Dan Brown
books.description: As he searches for the missing noetic scientist he has been seeing, Robert Langdon discovers something regarding a secret project.
books.title: THE SECRET OF SECRETS

books.author: Michael Connelly
books.description: The eighth book in the Lincoln Lawyer series. Mickey Haller enlists a journalist to help his lawsuit against an A.I. company.
books.title: THE PROVING GROUND

books.author: Ana Huang
books.description: The second book in the Gods of the Game series. A professional athlete and the coachâ€™s daughter, who is a sports nutritionist, share a flat.
books.title: THE DEFENDER

books.author: Nelson DeMille and Alex DeMille
books.contributor: by Nelson DeMille and Alex DeMille
books.description: The third book in the Scott Brodie & Maggie Taylor series. An investigation into the death of a military scientist surfaces troubling technology.
books.title: THE TIN MEN

books.author: Reese Witherspoon and Harlan Coben
books.contributor: by Reese Witherspoon and Harlan Coben
books.description: When a mysterious man disappears, the former combat surgeon giving him medical assistance goes on the lam.
books.title: GONE BEFORE GOODBYE

books.author: SenLinYu
books.description: After the war, an imprisoned alchemist is sent to a necromancer to recover her lost memories.
books.title: ALCHEMISED

books.author: Nicholas Sparks with M. Night Shyamalan
books.contributor: by Nicholas Sparks with M. Night Shyamalan
books.description: A New York architect moves to Cape Cod, where he enters a relationship that brings up a lot of questions.
books.title: REMAIN

books.author: Ali Hazelwood
books.description: To help stave off her enemies, Serena Paris, a Human-Were hybrid, forms a partnership with Koen Alexander.
books.title: MATE

books.author: Mitch Albom
books.description: Alfie Logan, who was gifted with the ability to live any moment a second time but must accept the outcomes, makes a risky love decision.
books.title: TWICE

books.author: Freida McFadden
books.description: Troubles surface when a woman looking to make a fresh start takes a job in the home of the Winchesters.
books.title: THE HOUSEMAID

books.author: Freida McFadden
books.description: During a rough storm, Casey puts herself in danger when she lets a girl, who is covered in blood, into her cabin.
books.title: THE INTRUDER

books.author: Catherine Newman
books.description: Shifts in circumstances affect Rocky and her family.
books.title: WRECK
